name: The Ink
description:
Here is a reference page for this game.

An adventure about a point of ink .

Play the game with keyboard WASD.

This is a 2d game in Chinese ink style. We started with a fish as the main character of the game, telling a story of finding the true self in the adventure.

We expect to design 5 levels, and now complete the 3 levels of prototypes, the theme is water, fire, wood, followed by soil and gold, a very typical Chinese five elements theory.

This demo version was released to hear a wider range of opinions. Game plot design, gameplay design, visual effects and more.

In the next step we will no longer be limited to a fish as the protagonist, we hope that the protagonist will advance the entire story line in a more pure ink form.

We hope that everyone will have fun and hope that more experienced people can join this creation, especially in technical art and level design.
